column4: Hi, since I've installed the nvidia restricted drivers update, I'm having this anoying startup logo/screen from Nvidia, how do I turn this off?
Hi, since I've installed the nvidia restricted drivers update, I'm having this anoying startup logo/screen from Nvidia, how do I turn this off?
gksu gedit /etc/X11/xorg.conf   in the device nvidia section add Option "Nologo" "on"
google in case I f'ed up the exact spelling or something on that.. but yeah
